DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate axis location toric contact lenses 3 minute wear . During 1-visit study , participant wear 3 pair study lenses various design iteration ( 2-87-1 , 2-87-2 , 2-87-3 ) exposure time approximately 30 minute . Each pair consist lens design iteration , 1 lens emboss mark [ TEST1 ( T1 ) , TEST3 ( T3 ) , TEST5 ( T5 ) ] , worn right eye , 1 lens without embossed mark [ TEST2 ( T2 ) , TEST4 ( T4 ) , TEST6 ( T6 ) ] worn leave eye .
DOC.brief_title: On-Eye Evaluation Contact Lens Axis Location
DOC.criteria: Sign write Informed Consent . Best correct distance visual acuity great equal 20/25 eye . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History ocular surgery ocular injury within 12 week enrollment study . Anterior segment disease , infection , inflammation , abnormality contraindicates contact lens wear . History herpetic keratitis . Slitlamp finding baseline specify protocol . Any use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate , include ocular medication require instillation contact lens wear . Clinically significant dry eye respond treatment . History refractive surgery . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
